name: pos-system
description: Gaming Store Point-of-Sale System - A comprehensive POS system designed specifically for gaming stores

scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "cd electron && npm run dev"
scripts.desktop: concurrently "npm run server" "cd electron && npm start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../electron && npm install
scripts.build:electron: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && cd electron && npm run build
scripts.build:win: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && cd electron && npm run build:win
scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && npm test" "cd client && npm test"
